title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Blue Light
directions: between Buchanan St and Charlton Ct
hours: Bar: M-F 4PM-2AM, Sa-Su 11AM-2AM  Kitchen: Kitchen M-F 5PM-10PM, Sa noon-10PM, Sunday 11AM-10PM
content: Their "Taco Tuesday" is a long standing favorite among locals and features $3 margaritas for the ladies. Guys are equally well served with $2 Coronas, and with $1 tacos, who could go hungry?
